Description: Acetate transporter required for normal sporulation; phosphorylated in mitochondria; ADY2 has a paralog, ATO2, that arose from the whole genome duplication [Source:SGD;Acc:S000000603]

Dubious open reading frame; unlikely to encode a functional protein, based on available experimental and comparative sequence data; partially overlaps the verified gene YBR301W; YBR300C is not an essential gene [Source:SGD;Acc:S000000504]

Dubious open reading frame; unlikely to encode a functional protein, based on available experimental and comparative sequence data; not conserved in closely related Saccharomyces species; partially overlaps the verified gene MAE1 [Source:SGD;Acc:S000001513]

Mannoprotein that is incorporated into the cell wall; incorporated via a glycosylphosphatidylinositol (GPI) anchor; involved in the retention of siderophore-iron in the cell wall [Source:SGD;Acc:S000002942]
Putative protein of unknown function; YBR219C is not an essential gene [Source:SGD;Acc:S000000423]

Unconventional prefoldin protein involved in translation initiation; required for correct assembly of RNAP I, II, and III in an Rpb5p-dependent manner; shuttles between nucleus and cytoplasm; mutants have inappropriate expression of nutrient sensitive genes due to translational derepression of Gcn4p transcription factor; diploid mutants show random budding; ortholog of human URI/RMP [Source:SGD;Acc:S000001871]

Pseudogenic fragment with similarity to flocculins; identified by gene-trapping, microarray-based expression analysis, and genome-wide homology searching; YHR213W-B has a paralog, YAR064W, that arose from a segmental duplication [Source:SGD;Acc:S000028652]
Dubious open reading frame; unlikely to encode a functional protein, based on available experimental and comparative sequence data [Source:SGD;Acc:S000004859]
